Sentencas: Double perovskite oxides SmBaCo2-xNi3O5+delta (SBCNx) (x=0-0.5) are synthesized via an EDTA-glycine process as cathodes for intermediate temperature solid oxide fuel cells (IT-SOFCs).
Titulo: Synthesis and properties of SmBaCo2-xNixO5+δ perovskite oxide for IT-SOFC cathodes

Sentencas: In this study, we investigate the effects of Ni substitution for the Co sites in SmBaCo2O5+delta (SECO) in terms of structural characteristics, electrical properties, and electrochemical performance of SBCNx.
Titulo: Synthesis and properties of SmBaCo2-xNixO5+δ perovskite oxide for IT-SOFC cathodes

Sentencas: At the given temperature, the electrical conductivities of SBCNx decrease as the Ni content increases, and SBCO exhibits a maximum conductivity of 1091 S cm(-1) at 250 degrees C.
Titulo: Synthesis and properties of SmBaCo2-xNixO5+δ perovskite oxide for IT-SOFC cathodes

Sentencas: The average thermal expansion coefficients (TEC) over the temperature range of 25-800 degrees C show a decreased trend from 19.96 x 10(-6) K-1 for SBCO to 16.26 x 10(-6) K-1 for SBCN0.5, while the average TEC of SBCN0.3 reaches a minimum of 15.59 x 10(-6) K-1.
Titulo: Synthesis and properties of SmBaCo2-xNixO5+δ perovskite oxide for IT-SOFC cathodes

Sentencas: Generally, the power density of a single fuel cell at 600-800 degrees C decreases as the Ni content increases, whereas the polarization resistance (R-P) of SBCNx on a Sm0.2Ce0.8O1.9 (SDC) electrolyte is enhanced.
Titulo: Synthesis and properties of SmBaCo2-xNixO5+δ perovskite oxide for IT-SOFC cathodes

Sentencas: Among all of the samples, SBCN0.3 exhibits a combination of low thermal expansion (15.59 x 10(-6) K-1), a reasonably low R-P value (0.0464 Omega cm(2) at 800 degrees C) and high power density (536 mW cm(-2) at 800 degrees C); thus, it may be a promising candidate for IT-SOFCs.
Titulo: Synthesis and properties of SmBaCo2-xNixO5+δ perovskite oxide for IT-SOFC cathodes
Synthesis and properties of SmBaCo2-xNixO5+δ perovskite oxide for IT-SOFC cathodes

Sentencas: Elsevier Ltd and Techna Group S.r.l.
Titulo: Synthesis and properties of SmBaCo2-xNixO5+δ perovskite oxide for IT-SOFC cathodes
